item.description:
Did you know there are freedom movements in Afghanistan, Pakistan, Malaysia, China, Russia, Slovakia, and Nigeria? Tom Palmer travels the globe to help create and nurture organizations committed to advancing human freedom, helping champions of freedom create a better world. Dr. Palmer is Executive Vice President for International Programs of the Atlas Economic Research Foundation. Atlas supports an international network of more than 400 free-market organizations in over 80 countries.

Register at http://www.libertybu.com

group.name: The Boston Ayn Rand Meetup Group

item.name: Adventures in International Freedom with Dr. Tom Palmer
